text: it is an exciting time for our isp

hi i'm kriti a security solutions
architect here at amazon internet
services private limited in my
day-to-day life i work with customers
from all industry verticals wherein i go
to them we assess their security posture
look at the gaps and then i provide
recommendations for them to implement so
that their workloads are secure while
running on aws

architect in amazon internet services
private limited my responsibilities
include providing solutions to our

problem statements so that they can run
their workloads optimally on aws in my

everybody can grow and contribute
this place feels different because of
the team and the awesome culture that we
have here at amazon an advice that i
would give to anyone who is looking to
